meanings.definition: An activity that serves to make time pass agreeably.
meanings.sent1: Playing board games is a fun pastime for the whole family.
meanings.sent2: Fishing is a popular pastime for many people who enjoy the outdoors.
meanings.sent3: Her pastime of knitting always helps her relax after a long day.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of chaos, gardening can be a peaceful pastime.
meanings.sent5: The pastime of birdwatching allows you to connect with nature in a unique way.

meanings.definition: Something that serves to make time pass agreeably; a pleasant means of amusement, recreation, or sport.
meanings.sent1: Reading mystery novels is a favorite pastime of hers.
meanings.sent2: Watching movies is a common pastime for people looking to unwind.
meanings.sent3: His pastime of collecting stamps may seem old-fashioned, but it brings him joy.
meanings.sent4: Music can be a universal pastime that transcends language barriers.
meanings.sent5: Exploring new hiking trails can be an exciting pastime for adventure seekers.
